website_summaries.verdict: This darling water fountain offers a whimsical look, and is a great choice for small spaces in direct sunlight.
pros: Looks great in gardens, thanks to the green glazed finish and cute frog design
Compact, so you can place it almost anywhere there's direct sunlight
cons: Requires full sun exposure to run properly

customer_reviews.title: Smart Solar Ceramic Frog Solar Fountain.
customer_reviews.text: The fountain is extremely small. I saw several on Amazon and thought I chose the largest, but it wasn't. The only time water comes out the frog's mouth is during direct contact with the sun. If a cloud passes over water stops flowing from frog's mouth. I get approximately 1 hour in a 24-hour day to enjoy water dispersing from frog's mouth. The only reason I'm keeping it is because my little grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is very nice. The solar does need to be in FULL SUN to work and it does not store the energy. So in my case it gets sun from about 10 am - 3 pm., and only runs during that time. Mine sits on the ground in a courtyard so it does need to be cleaned about once a month. Overall for the price and quality I feel it was a very good purchase, and it fit perfectly in the small area I had.
customer_reviews.author: Zola

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for a friend too and it works beautifully! WARNING, if anything goes wrong with the pump DO NOT BUY THE REPLACEMENT PUMP ADVERTISED! (The pump extension isn't long enough to connect in the frog...or fish....or whichever adornment you choose. The pump was pricey and DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.author: PJA

customer_reviews.title: Works as it was described
customer_reviews.text: It works only when direct sun light hits the little solar panel. A little cloud on a sky and it stops working. But that is Ok, considering small size of solar panel. I did not need a big one sitting in my small garden. This fountain had a few dents, the small piece at the bottom of the frog that has to be inserted into the bowl was broken off. But it still could firmly in the bowl. I don't know about birds, but feral cats enjoy drinking water from it. Fountaine is functioning not just little cute fountain but also as an expensive water bowl for outdoor cats.
customer_reviews.author: avr

customer_reviews.title: Ceremic Frog
customer_reviews.text: What I liked most about this product was that it was solar powered. As such, it can be placed any place there is sun for the solar portion and yet the fountain can be either in shade or sun
customer_reviews.author: Marlene K

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, not as big as I was expecting ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, not as big as I was expecting. It does not hold alot of water and the solar panel only runs when the sun it on it. Had to fill it all the time in the summer. Water got low while I was on vacation and the pump stopped working. I still use it for decoration though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little solar fountain
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. Had a little problem getting the cord for the pump through the hole on the dish but was finally able to work it through. Definately affected/effected (whichever) by cloud cover but started right up so I was impressed. Still new so we shall see what we shall see. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: EllyH

customer_reviews.title: drowned frog
customer_reviews.text: I've spent over two hours trying to put this together, None of the connections are the right size and can't be fitted together
customer_reviews.author: lolly j

customer_reviews.title: Cute as can be!
customer_reviews.text: really adorable garden piece, it does require full sun to operate. Makes a soothing water sound, birds like it too! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SMART SOLAR
customer_reviews.text: Mine was defective, pump ran for about 15 minutes then quit. Didn't even get enough power to flow the water through the frog! TOTAL DISAPPOINTMENT AND A WASTE OF GOOD MONEY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This fountain looks perfect in my side garden with the bee balm in the back. Dogs were alittle surprised by it when it started working after a shady day but even they like it now. This will be the first of many purchases from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: C. Charland

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I am worried about what happens to the motor if the water level runs low on a sunny day. This is because the directions say don't let the water run low. It may not be an issue, maybe the motor shuts off??, but we haven't had enough sunny days to find out. The size and the design is nice. It is well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: A few kinks but great.
customer_reviews.text: Fountain arrived packaged very secure and safe. After a number of tries to get fountain to flow water correctly I contacted customer service and they were very helpful. I still wasn't happy with water flow so I attached a AC adapter as another reviewer suggested and it works beautifully. It seems unless you have strong direct sunlight the water trickles more than flows. Like having the option of using solar or electrical power. I use the electrical adapter more, then it doesn't start and stop. The wildlife seem to enjoy as much as I do. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jody G

customer_reviews.title: So nice
customer_reviews.text: I love my solar fountain. It works so well and the ceramic is well made,not too tacky.It blended well in my flower bed.
customer_reviews.author: Vero Buzard

customer_reviews.title: Works very well in the sun, delightful!
customer_reviews.text: Every day that the sun is out this little fountain works very well. It is delightful to see and hear and very easy to take care of.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly B. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: The pump feature is erratic; sometimes, even in full sunlight, it doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a little water feature in my garden. Because this one is solar, there was no installation problem. I'm a little leery of inexpensive solar things - had bad luck with a previous item - but so far this one is working like a champ! The water stream spouting from the little frog's mouth is strong enough to make a delightful sound. It looks so cute in my garden!
customer_reviews.author: Renny R. Maddox

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: i recieved my fountain hooked it up and the solor part would not work i figured it would be to costly to send back so i will just right it off as a lost and never buy thanks hazel carroll
customer_reviews.author: hazel carroll

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our fountain!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so it's a bit small, but I bought two of them so I hope that will be enough to keep my birds hydrated. With a little bit of manipulation, I got all the parts to fit together perfectly, and in full sun, it works great. It does stop pumping when a cloud passes over, but that's okay. I like this fountain, and it makes a nice addition to our patio. :)
customer_reviews.author: PlanetGranite

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fountain last week through Amazon. It looks nice but the pump does not work. I called customer service and they instructed me to manually start the pump - which I did 10 times. As soon as I put the pump in the water it shuts off. This is not a reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbi

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but a few caveats
customer_reviews.text: We love the look and sound of this fountain. However, before purchasing, realize there is no battery backup so water will only come out when sun is shining on the solar panel. Also, it seems to stop working about every week or more often. The first time we thought it was shot and almost tossed it, but we found there's a filter that needs cleaning. It gets clogged easily with plant material.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E

customer_reviews.title: The fountain was put in direct Georgia sun for about ...
customer_reviews.text: The fountain was put in direct Georgia sun for about 3-4 hours a day. It worked to two days then quit. It is a attractive birdbath, just wished that it would have kept running. I followed the online troubleshooting suggestions and that did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Lovely addition to my patio
customer_reviews.text: I love this fountain. I should add that one part was included that did not belong to the kit. Keep it clean and there will be no problems. I have been using it for the last month (June 2015).
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

product_meta.title: Smart Solar Ceramic Frog Fountain (Green)
product_meta.description: This solar powered green glazed ceramic frog water feature is fun and soothing at the same time. Water flows constantly through the frog’s mouth and into the bowl which creates a relaxing atmosphere in your garden, patio or balcony. This fountain constantly recycles the same water and is powered by a separate solar panel (supplied) and operates in direct sunlight. It has a multi fixing panel holder and low voltage water pump with filter and 10ft : 3m cable to solar panel. Best of all there is no wiring or operating costs just simply install and enjoy!
feature_bullets: Fountain constantly recycles the same water
Powered by a separate solar panel (supplied) and operates in direct sunlight.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars88 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
